documentTitle: Sale of a second hand vehicle (Company to Individual)
pageTitle: Sale of a second hand vehicle - Company to Individual(s)
description: You're viewing the instructions for a company selling their vehicle to an individual (or multiple individuals). You're the company's representative.
companyRepresentativeNote: Note: A company's representative needs to be an employee of the company.

vendorHasStamp.label: Does your company have a stamp?

isVehicleRegistrationBookValid.label: Is all the information on the vehicle's registration book up to date?

preparation.title: Preparation

commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDF_singleP: <label>Ask the purchaser for a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of one of the <DeedsOfSale /> to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is crucial. In case there is any mistake, the <NLTAAbbr /> will ask for amendments to be made to the <DeedsOfSale />, then to come back later.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDF_multipl: <label>Ask the purchasers for a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of one of the <DeedsOfSale /> to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is crucial. In case there is any mistake, the <NLTAAbbr /> will ask for amendments to be made to the <DeedsOfSale />, then to come back later.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserAuthorizationLetterPhotoOrPD: <label>Ask the purchaser for a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>

<label>Ask the purchasers for a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>
commonSteps.fillAndCheckDeedsOfSale: <label>You can use our <DeedOfSaleImportantLink>document generator</DeedOfSaleImportantLink> to generate the <DeedOfSale />. Alternatively, you can find a template of the <DeedOfSale /> on <GovtDeedOfSaleLink><NLTAAbbr />'s website</GovtDeedOfSaleLink>. Make sure that all 3 <DeedsOfSale /> are correctly filled, i.e. no typos. Do not sign any of the <DeedsOfSale /> yet.</label>
commonSteps.fillAndCheckSelfAuthorizationLetter_dire: <label>You can use our <C1ToD1AuthorizationLetterImportantLink>document generator</C1ToD1AuthorizationLetterImportantLink> to generate the authorization letter. Alternatively, you can find a template of the authorization letter on <GovtAuthorizationLetterLink><NLTAAbbr />'s website</GovtAuthorizationLetterLink>. Make sure that the authorization letter is correctly filled, i.e. no typos. Do not sign the authorization letter yet.</label>

<label>You can use our document generators (<C1ToD1AuthorizationLetterImportantLink>authorize a director</C1ToD1AuthorizationLetterImportantLink> or <C1ToR1AuthorizationLetterImportantLink>authorize a company representative</C1ToR1AuthorizationLetterImportantLink>) to generate the authorization letter. Alternatively, you can find a template of the authorization letter on <GovtAuthorizationLetterLink><NLTAAbbr />'s website</GovtAuthorizationLetterLink>. Make sure that the authorization letter is correctly filled, i.e. no typos. Do not sign the authorization letter yet.</label>
commonSteps.fillAndCheckPurchaserAuthorizationLetter: <label>You can use our <C1ToI2AuthorizationLetterImportantLink>document generator</C1ToI2AuthorizationLetterImportantLink> to generate the authorization letter. Alternatively, you can find a template of the authorization letter on <GovtAuthorizationLetterLink><NLTAAbbr />'s website</GovtAuthorizationLetterLink>. Make sure that the authorization letter is correctly filled, i.e. no typos. Do not sign the authorization letter yet.</label>
commonSteps.sendVehicleRegistrationBookPhotoToPurcha: <label>Send a photo of the <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchaser.</label>
<label>Send a photo of the <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.sendDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDFToPurchaser_sing: <label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of one of the <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchaser to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is crucial. In case there is any mistake, the <NLTAAbbr /> will ask for amendments to be made to the <DeedsOfSale />, then to come back later.</label>
commonSteps.sendDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDFToPurchaser_mult: <label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of one of the <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchasers to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is crucial. In case there is any mistake, the <NLTAAbbr /> will ask for amendments to be made to the <DeedsOfSale />, then to come back later.</label>
commonSteps.sendAuthorizationLetterPhotoOrPDFToPurch: <label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to the purchaser to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>

<label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to the purchasers to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>

preparation.requiredDirectorNote_singleDirector: Based on your scenario, your company's director is required at the to issue the . Hence, the rest of this page assumes you are your company's director.
preparation.requiredDirectorNote_multipleDirectors: Based on your scenario, one of your company's directors is required at the to issue the . Hence, the rest of this page assumes you're one of your company's directors.
preparation.step1: <label>How many company directors and purchasers are there?</label>
preparation.step2_singlePurchaser: <label>Decide with the purchaser about who will prepare the <DeedsOfSale /> and/or the authorization letter (to issue the <NonAttachmentCertificate />).</label>
preparation.step2_multiplePurchasers: <label>Decide with the purchasers about who will prepare the <DeedsOfSale /> and/or the authorization letter (to issue the <NonAttachmentCertificate />).</label>
preparation.step3_singlePurchaser: <label>Decide with the purchaser about who will go to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue the <NonAttachmentCertificate />. It's advised (not compulsory) that the purchaser goes to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue this document as you don't need to do anything once payment is effected.</label>
preparation.step3_multiplePurchasers: <label>Decide with the purchasers about who will go to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue the <NonAttachmentCertificate />. It's advised (not compulsory) that one of the purchasers goes to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue this document as you don't need to do anything once payment is effected.</label>
preparation.lastStep: <label>Ask the purchaser how they will pay for the vehicle.</label>

payment.title: Accept payment for the vehicle's sale
payment.description_singleDirector_singlePurchas: The purchaser and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.
The purchaser, your company's director and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.
payment.description_singleDirector_multiplePurch: The purchasers and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.
The purchasers, your company's director and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.
payment.description_multipleDirectors_singlePurc: The purchaser, your company's directors and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.
The purchaser, your company's directors and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.
payment.description_multipleDirectors_multiplePu: The purchasers, your company's directors and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.
The purchasers, your company's directors and you need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents can be signed.

commonSteps.askPurchaserProofOfIdentity_singlePurcha: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserProofOfIdentity_multiplePurc: <label>Ask the purchasers to each make sure to bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedsOfSale_singlePurchaser: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring the 3 filled <DeedsOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedsOfSale_multiplePurchase: <label>Ask the purchasers to make sure to bring the 3 filled <DeedsOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserAuthorizationLetter_singlePu: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring the filled authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserAuthorizationLetter_multiple: <label>Ask the purchasers to make sure to bring the filled authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.bringProofOfIdentity_singleDirector_dire: <label>Make sure to ask your company's director to bring their <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.bringProofOfIdentity_multipleDirectors_d: <label>Make sure that your company's directors and you each bring your original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
<label>Make sure that your company's directors bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.bringAuthorizationLetter: <label>Make sure to bring the filled authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.bringStamp: <label>Make sure to bring your company's stamp. If your company does not have a stamp, you will need to bring along an original certified document that mentions you as the director.</label>
commonSteps.verifyDeedsOfSale: <label>To avoid any unnecessary hassle later, verify all details on the <DeedsOfSale /> again as you have most documents in hand.</label>
commonSteps.verifyDeedsOfSaleAndAuthorizationLetter: <label>To avoid any unnecessary hassle later, verify all details on the <DeedsOfSale /> and authorization letter again as you have most documents in hand.</label>
commonSteps.keepProofOfIdentity_singleDirector_direc: <label>Your company's director needs to keep their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.keepProofOfIdentity_multipleDirectors_di: <label>Keep each of your company's directors' original <ProofOfIdentity />, including yours</label>
<label>Keep each of your company's directors' original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsProofOfIdentity_singlePurc: <label>The purchaser needs to keep their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsProofOfIdentity_multiplePu: <label>The purchasers need to keep their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsAuthorizationLetter_single: <label>The purchaser needs to keep the signed authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsAuthorizationLetter_multip: <label>The purchasers need to keep the signed authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserAuthorizationLetter_singleP: <label>Hand the signed authorization letter to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserAuthorizationLetter_multipl: <label>Hand the signed authorization letter to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.signatureMatch: Make sure the signatures match the ones on the respective party's <ProofOfIdentity />.
commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot: The bank will then inform you whether the funds have been transferred to your account.
commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud: This way, you don't need to worry about making sure you've been handed the exact amount, or anything like fake notes or other types of fraud.
commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale: The bank may ask you for a signed <DeedOfSale /> as proof of sale.
commonSteps.cashPaymentDeedSignature: <label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the other 2 <DeedsOfSale /> can be signed and stamped. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>
commonSteps.cashPaymentDeedAndLetterSignature: <label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the other 2 <DeedsOfSale /> and the authorization letter can be signed and stamped. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

payment.step1: <label>Make sure you've removed all personal belongings from the vehicle.</label>

paidInCash.cashDeposit_singleDirector_singlePurchas: Ask the purchaser to meet you (assuming you're the director) at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) The purchaser and you need to sign and stamp it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)
paidInCash.cashDeposit_singleDirector_multiplePurch: Ask the purchaers to meet you (assuming you're the director) at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) All purchaser and you need to sign and stamp it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)
paidInCash.cashDeposit_multipleDirectors_singlePurc: Ask the purchaser and the other company's directors to meet you at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) All directors and purchaser need to sign and stamp it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)
paidInCash.cashDeposit_multipleDirectors_multiplePu: Ask the purchasers and the other company's directors to meet you at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) All directors and purchasers need to sign and stamp it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)

payment.leaveWithVehicle_singlePurchaser: At this point, the purchaser can leave with the vehicle.
payment.leaveWithVehicle__multiplePurchasers: At this point, the purchasers can leave with the vehicle.

nonAttachment.title: Issue a
nonAttachment.description: The purpose of this document is to certify that the vehicle being sold is not legally tied to anything that prevents its sale, e.g. theft, loan, opposition of sale, etc. This document can be issued at 's headquarters or sub offices.

commonSteps.bringAuthorizationLetter: <label>Make sure to bring the signed authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.bringProofOfIdentity_multipleDirectors: <label>Make sure to bring each director's original <ProofOfIdentity />, including yours.</label>
commonSteps.bringRs50: <label>Make sure to bring Rs50 in cash.</label>
commonSteps.bringDirectorProof_singleDirector_direct: <label>Make sure to bring an original certified document that mentions you as your company's director.</label>
<label>Make sure to bring an original certified document that specifies your company's director as the director.</label>
commonSteps.bringDirectorProof_multipleDirectors_dir: <label>Make sure to bring an original certified document that specifies your company's directors as the directors.</label>
<label>Make sure to bring an original certified document that specifies your company's directors as the directors.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringDeedOfSale_singlePurc: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring their signed <DeedOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringDeedOfSale_multiplePu: <label>Ask the purchasers to make sure to bring their signed <DeedOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaser2StampedDeedsOfSale_singleP: <label>Make sure to hand the 2 stamped <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaser2StampedDeedsOfSale_multipl: <label>Make sure to hand the 2 stamped <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserVehicleRegistrationBook_sin: <label>Make sure to hand the original <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserVehicleRegistrationBook_mul: <label>Make sure to hand the original <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserNonAttachmentCertificate_si: <label>Make sure to hand the <NonAttachmentCertificate /> to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserNonAttachmentCertificate_mu: <label>Make sure to hand the <NonAttachmentCertificate /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.keepProofOfIdentity_multipleDirectors: <label>Keep your original <ProofOfIdentity /> and hand each of your company's directors theirs.</label>
commonSteps.keepDirectorProof_singleDirector_directo: <label>Keep the original certified document that mentions you as your company's director.</label>
commonSteps.keepDirectorProof_multipleDirectors_dire: <label>Keep the original certified document that specifies your company's director as the director.</label>
commonSteps.keepDirectorProof_singleDirector_directo: <label>Keep the original certified document that specifies your company's directors as the directors.</label>
commonSteps.keepDirectorProof_multipleDirectors_dire: <label>Keep the original certified document that specifies your company's directors as the directors</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringDeedOfSaleToMeeting_s: Before meeting with the purchaser, ask them to make sure to bring their signed .
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringDeedOfSaleToMeeting_m: Before meeting with the purchasers, ask them to make sure to bring their signed .

commonItems.directorProof_singleDirector_directorReq: • The original certified document that mentions you as your company's director.
commonItems.directorProof_singleDirector_directorNot: • The original certified document that specifies your company's directors as the directors.
commonItems.directorProof_multipleDirectors_director: • The original certified document that specifies your company's director as the director.
• The original certified document that specifies your company's directors as the directors

conditionalInstructions1.description: Before going to the , ensure the following:

conditionalInstructions2.description: The officer will hand you the following:

informInsurance: Make sure to inform the insurance company about the sale of the vehicle so they can terminate its insurance contract.
endingNote_singlePurchaser: At this point, you're done with all the required formalities. The purchaser will need to proceed with registration, insurance and transfer of ownership.
endingNote_multiplePurchasers: At this point, you're done with all the required formalities. The purchaser will need to proceed with registration, insurance and transfer of ownership.
